attributes.action: develop a national network of free to use community based wireless networks for the benefit of all
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
... for many in the community access to services comes at a significant cost, both in terms of monetary inhibitors as well as social exclusion. it is not difficult to recall recent shocking examples of social disengagement.

...the upcoming requirement to convert to digital tv provides an ideal opportunity to revolutionise the countries communication system
